headlines: Windows 11: A guide to the updates
sub_headlines: Here’s what you need to know about the latest updates to Windows 11 as they’re released from Microsoft. Now updated for KB5030310 Preview, released on Sept. 26, 2023.

headlines: Windows 11 Insider Previews: What’s in the latest build?
sub_headlines: Get the latest info on new preview builds of Windows 11 as they roll out to Windows Insiders. Now updated for Build 22621.2361 for the Release Preview Channel and Build 23550 for the Dev Channel, both released on Sept. 22, 2023.

headlines: How to fix Windows 10 and 11 printing problems
sub_headlines: Although Windows 10 and 11 are generally stable, printer issues do occur from time to time. Here are some tips to work around typical Windows print gotchas.

headlines: The AI future of Windows is here
sub_headlines: Forget Windows 12: Microsoft’s big AI push is starting on your current Windows 11 PC on Sept. 26.

headlines: Critical updates for Microsoft Office and Visual Studio drive September's Patch Tuesday
sub_headlines: Microsoft this week rolled out 59 updates with its Patch Tuesday update, including critical patches for Microsoft Office and Visual Studio.

headlines: 5 steps to a lean, clean Windows machine
sub_headlines: Performing a regular disk-cleaning regimen frees up precious storage space and helps keep Windows 10 or 11 operating smoothly. Follow some or all of these steps to get yourself a lean, clean machine.

headlines: Windows desktop apps are the future (with or without Windows)
sub_headlines: From cloud PCs and smart TVs to Chromebooks, Macs, and Linux systems, everyone is betting on traditional Windows desktop applications.

headlines: How to share a Windows 10 or 11 PC
sub_headlines: Need to share a PC among employees or temporary workers at the office, or with family members at home? No problem — here's how to do it.

headlines: Windows on Mac improves for professional environments
sub_headlines: Highlights of the latest Parallels Desktop release include TouchID support for Windows, much improved Intune enrollment, and remote access to VM instances in the cloud.

headlines: The line-blurring brilliance of Google's new ChromeOS-Windows connection
sub_headlines: Google's latest ChromeOS improvement brings Windows apps even closer to the heart of the operating system — with a very Googley twist.

headlines: Should you upgrade to Windows 11? It’s complicated
sub_headlines: The choice is yours – but it also depends on your hardware. Some PCs shouldn’t run Windows 11, and others shouldn’t run Windows 10.

headlines: Microsoft cheat sheets: Dive into Windows and Office apps
sub_headlines: These guides will help you find your way around several generations of Microsoft’s Office apps for Windows — and Windows itself.

headlines: Patch Tuesday: Microsoft rolls out 90 updates for Windows, Office
sub_headlines: Microsoft released 90 updates for the Windows and Office platforms this week along with another update for Microsoft Exchange — paired with a warning about failed updates to Exchange Server 2016 and 2019.

headlines: Windows 10 Insider Previews: A guide to the builds
sub_headlines: Get the latest info on new preview builds for Windows 10 22H2 as they roll out from Microsoft. Now updated for 19045.3391 (KB5029331) for the Release Preview Channel, released on Aug. 10, 2023.

headlines: Make multitasking a Snap on your Windows PC
sub_headlines: Here’s how to put your Windows PC’s ultimate multitasking feature to use — and how to go beyond it for even more power, whether you’re using Windows 11 or Windows 10.
In workplace practice, disk cloning supports various valuable uses. Learn how to clone a drive in Windows 10 or 11 using two recommended tools.

headlines: ‘Windows is a declining ecosystem,' Jamf CEO says
sub_headlines: Dean Hager argues that Windows is on its way out: “Organizations must realize that in 10 years’ time, Windows will not be the dominant ecosystem."

headlines: 8 ways to be more productive in Windows 11
sub_headlines: Think Windows 11 can’t give you a productivity boost? Think again. Try these tips to get more accomplished in less time.
